description:
Alessio is home cleaning up when Hunter comes downstairs to start the day and begins to talk about how busy his day is going to be but he has a time for quickie. Alessio can't get the courage up to breakup with him but instead walks over and gets down on his knees to service his man before he starts his day. Alessio is not into it at all but he goes with the motions and fucks him hard and deep out of anger. He wants this relationship to end so bad so he can be with Rikk. All he can think about his fucking Rikk and this probably will be the last time he has sex with Hunter if he can get the balls to breakup with him. Alessio gives Hunter exactly what he wants and fucks him on the floor then stands above him as he shoots his cum down onto Hunter.

Enjoy!
title: Half Hearted Part 2
